main event: A witness in Dayton, Ohio observed a bright white light that changed in size and color, moving northward, on September 12, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to change in size and color, shifting between white, blue, and green.
The object moved northward in the sky.
There were no visible stars in the sky before the object appeared.
The witness reported the sighting to the Air Force, but more information was needed for a full scientific evaluation.
sighted object: a bright white light that changed in size and color
